cleaned_text: Crystal Aromatherapy Candles Crystal Aromatherapy Candles $33.95 New to our collection, these 100% soy wax candles are fragranced only with essential oil and contain 1 healing crystal inside each candle. Healing crystals are roughly 1 inch in size and include your choice of: - Blue Goldstone - Protection stone - Rose Quartz - Love stone - Citrine - Power & success stone - Blue Lace Agate - Calming stone Each 9 oz candle comes in a glass container that looks beautiful in any space of your home. Need help placing your order or have questions? Simply call or text 484-823-0004 or email us at sales@flaskbrands.com Scent: Quantity: Add To Cart
